com.untamedears.contraptions

Class ContraptionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.untamedears.contraptions.ContraptionManager

  • public class ContraptionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages access, loading, and saving of Contraptions

      • loadProperties

        public void loadProperties(java.io.File file)

      • loadContraptions

        public void loadContraptions(java.io.File file)
        Loads the Contraptions from a file

        Contraptions should be formatted as followg: 

         [
   {
     "ID": "FactoryTypeA",
     "Location": [0, 0, 0],
     "Resources": {
       "resource1:": 0
     }
   },
   {
     ...
   }
 ]

        Parameters:
        file - File to be loaded

      • loadContraptions

        public void loadContraptions()
        Called if there is no savefile.json to load

      • saveContraptions

        public void saveContraptions(java.io.File file)
        Saves all the current Contraptions to a file

        Parameters:
        file - File Contraptions are saved to

        Returns:
        Contraption at location or null

      • getContraptions

        public java.util.Set<Contraption> getContraptions(org.bukkit.Location location,
                                         int radius)
        Gets contraptions located within a square around the given location

        Parameters:
        location - Central location
        radius - Square radius from which to search
        Returns:
        Set of contraptions in radius
